dan aharawala ahuwath katada aadare kiyala issellama ammata kiyala , ee lagata nangita kiyala , thawa rate loke dahayakage nan kiyala kiyanawa eelagata aadare thaththita kiyala, (ethakota thama ithin atamata hithenne ussala wisikaranda welata) passe mama dennan umbaata kiyala hithala dawasak kella bayit ekata gaththa ''thaththi mata monawada genawe'' genapu delum gediya hangagana mama kiyuwa ''ayiyo mata amathaka una'' bella namala kata ada karapu meki kiyapi ''amathaka una, ayi oya dannadda mama oya enakan aharagana inne oya gena eka kalama doyiyanda kiyala'' ''anika mata ada salli hambuneth na'' inata athdeka thiyagana meki, mata dunna redi galawenda ''salli hambun na kiyanne , ayi ada ude idan mashin hadanda yanawa kiyala koheda giye'' unge ammawath mata ohoma kawadawath kiyala na mokatada nikan sawuththu wenne kiyala eda idan mama gena deyak undage athata dila karabagannawa.
